summary: A group of animals look for a way off of an eccentric billionaire's own personal Noah's Ark.
cast: David Robles|Cecilia Santiago|Conchi López|Abraham Aguilar|Julio Núñez|Roberto Cuenca|Stephen Hughes|Carlos del Pino|Pepa Castro|Beatriz Berciano|Javier Sáenz|David García|Esperanza Pedreño|César Sarachu|Javier Gauna|Álvaro Reina|Javier Moreno|Héctor Garay|Raquel Gribler|David Beteta|Pilar Coronado|Lorenzo Beteta|Fernando Hernández|Álvaro Rodríguez|Juan C. Lozano|Manuel Bellido|Álvaro Navarro|David Báscones|Roberto González|José Luis Martinez|Kate Petrie|Thisbe Burns|Craig Stevenson|Lúa Ríos|Cristina Glez. Reparaz
director: Directors: Raul Garcia (as Raúl García), Manuel Sicilia
title: El lince perdido
